ability: Water Blast:[side][.][exhaust][.]1[nat-cls]: Deal 2 damage to a target unit.
flavor_text: Be gone, interloper! This is where your trespass ends.

ability: Spirit Burn:[side][.][exhaust][.]1[basic]: Destroy a unit you control. If you do, you may deal 2 damage to a target unit or Phoenixborn.
flavor_text: Render unto me all that I desire most.

ability: Slash:[side][.]1[discard]: Deal 1 damage to a target unit. If an opponent has no units in play, you may deal 1 damage to their Phoenixborn instead.
flavor_text: You're out of your depth.

ability: Order:[side][.][exhaust][.]2[basic]: Remove 1 exhaustion token from a target unit on your battlefield.
flavor_text: Bow before the unyielding clarity of the light!

ability: Screams of the Departed: Whenever a unit under an opponent's control leaves play, you may spend 1[basic] to deal 1 damage to their Phoenixborn.
flavor_text: I don't care who bleeds, so long as there's blood.

ability: Summon Glow Finch:[side][.][exhaust][.]1[basic]: Place a Glow Finch conjuration onto your battlefield.
flavor_text: A flower to beg forgiveness, A kiss to preface bloodshed.

ability: Bolster:[side][.][exhaust][.]1[basic]: Add 1 to the attack value of all units you currently control for the remainder of this turn.
flavor_text: Well struck! Now it's my turn...

ability: Strike: After a player has declared attackers, you may spend 1[basic] and place 1 exhaustion token on this card. If you do, add 2 to a target unit's attack value for the remainder of the turn.
flavor_text: I defend this world and the next.

ability: Shadow Target:[side][.][exhaust][.]1[knife]: Place 1 exhaustion token on a target ready spell on an opponent's spellboard.
flavor_text: You're deceived. Nothing in this world is worth saving.

ability: Bounty:[side][.][exhaust][.]2[basic]: Select up to 4 dice in your exhausted pool. They must be all different types. Re-roll them, and place them into your active pool.
standard_deck: Orrick plays with fire and ice
flavor_text: Only in denying the Phoenix, can this world thrive.

ability: Ice Buff:[side][.][exhaust]: Attach an Ice Buff conjured alteration spell to a target unit you control.
flavor_text: I'm trying not to laugh at how serious you look!

ability: Heart's Pull:[side][.][exhaust][.]1[heart]: You may draw 1 card. If you do, you may choose a target player to discard 1 card off the top of their draw pile.
flavor_text: Darling, you're going to look like such a fright.

ability: Shadow Spring:[side][.][exhaust][.]1[wolf]: Select 2 dice in your exhausted pool and place them into your active pool on a side of your choice.
flavor_text: I'm not crazy... just enthusiastic!

ability:
[main][.][exhaust]: All players may draw up to 2 cards. For each card they cannot or do not draw, deal 1 damage to their Phoenixborn.

Focus 1: Reduce the damage your Phoenixborn receives from this spell by 1.

Focus 2: Reduce the damage your Phoenixborn receives from this spell by an additional 1.

inexhaustible_effect:
X = the number of charm dice on this unit.

Respark: 1[basic]

ability: Throw 1: During your turn, you may place 1 exhaustion token on this unit to deal 1 damage to a target unit.
flavor_text: The sea soon turns youth into old salt.

effect: Choose a target Phoenixborn. Its controlling player may discard 1 card at random from their hand. If they do not or cannot, place 2 wound tokens on that Phoenixborn. Then choose a target Phoenixborn. Its controlling player may move 2 dice your choice from their active pool to their exhausted pool. If they do not or cannot, place 2 wound tokens on that Phoenixborn

ability: Diminish 1: After an opponent has declared attackers, you may spend 1[basic] to reduce the attack value of each attacking unit by 1 for the remainder of the turn

Seal Strike 1: When this unit comes into play you may spend 1[basic] to place 1 exhaustion token on a target ready spell.

Shadow Strike 2:[main][.][exhaust]: Deal 2 damage to a unit.

Blood Oath 2: When you are declaring attackers, you may add 2 attack to this unit for the remainder of this turn. If you do, place 2 wound tokens on this unit.

Battle Advantage: When this unit is in battle, it inflicts its damage before other units without Battle Advantage inflict their damage.

effect:
Choose a unit you control and destroy it. Place X exhaustion tokens on a target unit.

X = the chosen unit's life value minus the number of wound tokens on the chose unit.
flavor_text: As one burden ends, another initiates.

ability:
Cursed 1: At the end of each round, place 1 wound token on your Phoenixborn.

Self Inflict 1:[side][.]1[basic]: Deal 1 damage to this unit.
flavor_text: My puppets guarantee things get messy.

ability: [side][.][exhaust][.]1[knife][.]1[heart]: Deal 2 damage to a target unit you control. If you do, you may remove 2 wound tokens from another unit you control or remove 1 wound token from your Phoenixborn.
flavor_text: Meat, blood, gristle... I manage my resources.

ability: Gaze 1: After a unit comes into play on an opponent's battlefield, you may spend 1[basic] to place 1 exhaustion token on that unit.
flavor_text: They can smell the water within your flesh!

effect:
This spell cannot be attached to a unit that already has a spell with the word "Inversion" in its title attached to it.

When attaching this spell to a unit that has the Illusion ability, the player that played this spell may select 2 illusion dice in their exhausted pool and place them into their active pool on a side of their choice.
inexhaustible_effect: Switch this unit's printed attack and life values.

effect: Search your discard pile for an ally and place it into your hand.
flavor_text: Death satisfies no debt owed to me.

inexhaustible_effect:
This spell can only be attached to units with the Illusion ability. This unit is no longer considered to have the Illusion ability.

Respark: 2[basic]

ability: Unit Guard: This unit may guard a unit that is being attacked.
inexhaustible_effect:
Last Blessing 1: When this unit is destroyed, remove 1 wound token from a target unit or Phoenixborn.

X = the number of Summon Butterfly Monk spells on your spellboard.

effect: Change 3 dice in your active pool to a side of your choice.
flavor_text: Behold Eternity and tremble!

effect: Remove 1 exhaustion token from a target unit or place 1 exhaustion on a target unit.
flavor_text: Let us cast aside the earthly concerns that stifle you.

ability: When your Phoenixborn woiuld receive damage, you may remove any number of status tokens from this spell. For each status token removed, prevent 1 damage to your Phoenixborn.
inexhaustible_effect: When this spell comes into play, place 3 status tokens on it. Discard this spell when it no longer has any status tokens on it

effect: Whenever a unit you control is destroyed, you may place 1 exhaution token on this spell to deal 1 damage to a target unit or Phoenixborn
flavor_text: Let death find the liars who called me brother.

effect: During your turn, if this spell has 3 or more status tokens on it, you may discard this spell to select 3 dice in your exhausted pool and place them into your active pool on a side of your choice.
inexhaustible_effect: When an ally you control is destroyed, you may place 1 status token on this spell.

effect: You may play this spell when an opponent would use a unit or Phoenixborn ability that is not inexhautible. Cancel the effects of that ability for the remainder of this turn.
flavor_text: Ideas breed disloyalty and words are their foul seed.

ability: Detonate 3:[side]: Destroy this unit to place 1 wound token on up to 3 target units.
flavor_text: Bathe them in the glory of your martyred flesh.

effect:
This unit now has the following ability.

Unit Guard: This unit may guard a unit that is being attacked.
flavor_text: Hey! Stop trying to kill all my stuff!

ability: [main][.][exhaust][.]1[knife][.]1[basic]: Deal 2 damage to a unit you control. If you do, you may discard a target alteration spell.
flavor_text: Sorry, precious. You life has better uses.

inexhaustible_effect:
When attaching this spell, place 3 status tokens on this spell. Discard this spell when it no longer has any status tokens on it. As long as this spell is attached to this unit, this unit is considered to be exhausted.

This unit now has the following ability:

Thaw:[side]: Remove 1 status token from a Deep Freeze alteration spell attached to this unit.

effect: Remove 2 status tokens from a target card or choose a target alteration spell. If that alteration spell is a conjured alteration spell, return it to its owner's conjuration pile. Otherwise, shuffle it into its owner's draw pile.
flavor_text: I strip aside this petty facade so that we might revel in the essence of what is truly you.

inexhaustible_effect: Rage 1: Add 1 to this units attack value for each wound token on this unit.
flavor_text: Show them the futility of struggle.

effect:
After a player has declared attackers, you may spend 1[basic] and place 1 exhaustion token on this spell. If you do add 1 to a target unit's attacke value for the remainder of this turn.

In addition, you may draw 1 card. If you do, discard 1 card.

Focus 1: In addition, you may select 1 die in your exhausted pool, re-roll it, and place it into your active pool.

ability: Song of Sorrow: After an opponent discards 1 or more cards from their draw pile, you may spend 1[basic] to place 1 wound token on a target unit.
flavor_text: I know the arts aren't for everyone, but I kill those people.

ability: [main][.][exhaust]: Select 1 die in your exhausted pool, re-roll it, and place it into you active pool.
flavor_text: Here's a little trick I learned.

effect: Destroy this unit at the end of the round. If the destroyed unit was an ally, remove it from teh game.
flavor_text: To die is not enough. You shall cease to have ever been.

ability: Unit Guard: This unit may guard a unit being attacked.
inexhaustible_effect: Illusion: If this unit receives damage as a result of a unit's attack or counter, destroy this unit.

effect: Choose a target unit under an opponent's control. If it is a conjuration, return it to its owners conjuration pile. Otherwise return it to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: Your minions have figured out what you cannot.

effect: You may play this spell when an opponent chooses to counter with a unit they control. Prevent all damage the attacking unit or units would receive from the countering unit this battle.
flavor_text: You're flailing around all stupid like a stupid-head.

effect: You may play this spell when a unit you control is destroyed. Deal 2 damage to a target unit or Phoenixborn.
flavor_text: Drag them down with you.

ability: Ambush 1: When this unit comes into play, you may deal 1 damage to a target unit or Phoenixborn.
flavor_text: A life can only find value in service to Blackcloud.

ability: Double Shot 1:[side][.][exhaust]: Deal 1 damege to a target unit. Then you may deal 1 damage to a target unit.
flavor_text: Stings a little more the second time, doesn't it?

effect: Deal 2 damage to a target unit. Remove 2 status tokens from that unit.
flavor_text: Your toys are boring. Let's play with something else.

ability:
[main][.][exhaust][.]1[leaf]: Deal 1 damage to a target unit or Phoenixborn.

Focus 1: You may change the activation cost of this ability to [main][.][exhaust][.]1[basic].
flavor_text: You'll find Northerners can be annoyingly literal.

ability: Battle Advantage: When this unit is in battle it deals its damage before other units without Battle Advantage deal their damage.
inexhaustible_effect: Rapid Healing 1: When this unit would receive damage, you may spend any number of [basic]. For each [basic] spent prevent 1 damage.

ability:
Freeze 1: When this unit deals damage to another unit you may spend 1[basic] to place 1 exhustion token on that unit.

Spite 1: When this unit deals damage to a Phoenixborn you may deal 1 additional damage to that Phoenixborn.
flavor_text: I've got giant ice bears, and it feels good saying that.
Now who's my fancy looking murder machine?

ability: Unit Guard: This unit may guard a unit that is being attacked.
inexhaustible_effect: Inheritance 1: When this unit is destroyed you may place 1 status token on a target unit.
flavor_text: They safeguard a power beyond any of us.

ability:
Unit Guard: This unit may guard a unit that is being attacked.

Decoy: When a unit you control would become the target of a spell, ability or dice power, and this unit could have been chosen as that target, you may place 1 exhaustion token on this unit to change the chosen target to be this unit instead.
inexhaustible_effect:
Last Request 1: When this unit is destroyed, discard 1 card off the top of a target player's draw pile.

Magic Rejuvenation:[side]: Remove an alteration spell attached to this unit from the game. If you do, remove all exhaution tokens from this unit.

ability: Alert: Do not place an exhaustion token on this unit as a result of countering.
flavor_text: We were raised together as children, and now we seek to save the world together.

effect: You may play this spell when an opponent uses a spell, ability, or dice power that would target a unit you control. Cancel the effects of that spell, ability, or dice power.
flavor_text: No.

ability: Aftershock 1: When this unit damages by attacking or countering, you may place 1 wound token on a target unit.
flavor_text: They pummeled the chimera. Now they'll pummel you!

effect: Select 2 dice in your exhausted pool and place them into your active pool on a side of your choice.
flavor_text: Sometimes I blush at my own competence.

ability:
[side][.][exhaust][.]2[heart]: Choose a target unit you control to gain the following ability for the remainder of the turn.

Bypass: This unit cannot be blocked or guarded.
flavor_text: Step aside. I have something precious for your master.
Toughen up and kill something, would ya?

inexhaustible_effect: Skin Morph 2: Add 2 to this unit's lif value if it has 1 or more alteration spells attached to it.
flavor_text: They're tough like me, but without the raw charisma.

effect: You may play this spell after a unit with a life value of 2 or less comes into play. Destroy that target unit.
flavor_text: Aw, I'm sure he'll learn to fly one day.

effect: Select 1 illusion die in your exhausted pool and place it into your active pool on a side of your choice. Shuffle this card into your draw pile.
flavor_text: I'm not ready to stop yet!
Welcome to Rustwatch, you bastards!

inexhaustible_effect:
Resourceful 1: When this unit comes into play, place 1 status token on this unit. At the beginning of the player turn phase, place 1 status token on this unit.

Overtime: Anytime during your turn, you may remove any number of status tokens from this unit. For each status token removed, you may take 1 addtional side action ([side]) this turn.

ability: Shadow Drain 1: When this unit receives 1 or more damage, you may select 1 die in a target player's active pool and place it in that player's exhausted pool.
flavor_text: You'll find killing them to be exhausting work.

ability:
Pain Link: Whenever this unit receives damage, you may spend 1[basic] to inflict X amount of damage to a target unit or Phoenixborn.

X = the damage received or this unit's life value, whichever is less.

flavor_text: Look past reality. You'll see my wolves stalking you.

inexhaustible_effect:
This spell can only be attached to a unit with an attack value of 2 or less.

Spell Guard: This spell cannot be affected by an opponent's spell.

Fleeting: Discard this card at the end of the round.

ability: [main][.][exhaust][.]1[heart]: Look at the target player's hand. That player may discard 1 card of your choice from that hand. If they do not or cannot, place 1 wound token on their Phoenixborn.

effect: Choose a target opponent to reveal the top 5 cards of their draw pile. Choose 1 of those revealed cards and remove it from the game. Return the rest of the revealed cards to the top of that opponent's draw pile in the order of your choice.
flavor_text: You feel it, don't you? Like a lover's fingers running through your hair.
Small? Yes. But as infinite as the mists themselves.

effect: Deal 1 damage to all opponents' units. You may draw 1 card.
flavor_text: I shall cleanse this valley of your filth.

effect: Place 3 wound tokens on a target unit or Phoenixborn.
flavor_text: If gold is what your desire...

ability: Deathstrike: When this unit deals 1 or more damage to a unit it is attacking or countering, destroy the unit that received damage.
flavor_text: It is exquisite finality draped in a gentle kiss.

effect: Deal 1 damage to a target Phoenixborn. Deal 1 damage to all opponents' units. Draw 1 card.
flavor_text: I cleansed an ocean of beasts once. Like this!

effect: You may search your draw pile for 1 card and place it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your draw pile.
flavor_text: I have spent a lifetime preparing for this moment.

inexhaustible_effect: Peaceful Melody: Your opponents cannot take an Attack a Phoenixborn main action or Attack a Unit main action. During their turn an opponent may spend 1[basic]. If they do, all units are no longer considered to have the Peaceful Melody ability for the remainder of that turn.

effect:
Deal X amount of damage to a target unit. You may draw a card.

X = the number of units you have in play.
flavor_text: When the mists close in, the screaming begins.

effect: You may play this spell when a unit you control would receive 1 or more damage. This spell may be played even if you already played reaction spells this turn. Prevent 1 damage to that unit. Shuffle this card into your draw pile.
flavor_text: I can't murder you if you keep killing my things!

effect:
Deal 4 damage to a target unit.

Deal 2 damage to a target Phoenixborn.
flavor_text: You fail to understand what we are.

inexhaustible_effect: After you take a main action other than pass, deal 1 damage to this unit.
flavor_text: Even now I fester within the hearts of your friends.

ability: When a unit you control would receive damage, you may remove any number of status tokens from this spell. For each status token removed, prevent 1 damage to that unit.
inexhaustible_effect: When this spell comes into play, place 3 status tokens on it. Discard this card when it no longer has any status tokens on it.

ability:
[main][.][exhaust][.]1[heart]: Choose a target player to discard 1 card off the top of their draw pile.

Focus 1: You may pay 1[basic] to have the target player discard 1 additional card.
flavor_text: Poor child, you've been thinking on your own again.

inexhaustible_effect: Endurance: Remove all exhaustion tokens from this unit at the end of each round.
flavor_text: I point, and they will see it dead.

effect: You may play this spell when your Phoenixborn would take damage and you have at least 1 unit that you control in play. Do not deal that damage to your Phoenixborn. Instead deal that damage to a target unit you control.
flavor_text: If I die, it will be by my choosing.

effect: As long as this spell is attached to this unit it is considered to have no abilities other than inexhaustible abilities.
inexhaustible_effect: Respark: 1[basic]
flavor_text: Your soul is drowning in the life you've squandered.

effect: Remove all exhaustion tokens from a target unit.
flavor_text: Arise anew my friend. Justice cannot rest.

effect: When attaching this spell, discard all other alteration spells attached to this unit.
flavor_text: And just like that, your efforts are for naught.

effect: You may play this spell ater an opponent takes an Attack a Phoenixborn main action or Attack a Unit main action. Deal 2 damage to a target Phoenixborn. The player that controls that Phoenixborn must discard 2 cards off the top of their draw pile. If they cannot, deal 1 additional damage to their Phoenixborn.

You may select upto 5 dice in your exhausted pool, re-roll them, and place them into your active pool. You may spend any number of [frog] just rolled to deal that much damage to a target unit or Phoenixborn.
flavor_text: I'm going to straight-up slaughter you!

inexhaustible_effect: Respark: 1[basic]

ability: Distract: [side][.][exhaust]: Place 1 exhaustion token on a target unit.
flavor_text: An inspiring dedication to dance and murder.

effect: Choose a ready spell on a target player's spellboard. Place 1 exhaustion token on the chosen spell and on each other copy of the chosen spell on that player's spellboard.
flavor_text: Now do try to keep a civil tongue.

ability: Battle Advantage: When this unit is in battle, it inflicts its damage before other units without Battle Advantage inflict their damage.
inexhaustible_effect: Magic Guard: This unit cannot be affected by an opponent's spell.

effect: After a reaction spell is played and its effects have been resolved, you may place 1 exhaustion token on this spell to draw 1 card, or discard this card to take the reaction spell just played from it's owner's discard pile and place it in its owner's hand.
flavor_text: Bet you'll never guess where this door takes me!

effect: You may play this spell after your Phoenixborn receives damage from an attack. Deal 6 damage to a target unit your opponent controls.
flavor_text: Your every success furthers my purposes.

inexhaustible_effect: Illusion: If this unit receives damage as a result of a unit's attack or counter, destroy this unit.
flavor_text: The first time I made one of these things, I threw up a little. So I made a bunch more!

inexhaustible_effect:
Illusion: If this unit receives damage as a result of a unit's attack or counter, destroy this unit.

X = the number of Summon Shadow Spirit spells on your spellboard.

ability: [side][.][exhaust]: Change 2 dice in your active pool to a side of your choice.
flavor_text: Within the mists, even Truth can be reborn.

Consume: Whenever an opponent's unit is destroyed as a result of a spell, attack, counter, ability, or dice power you control, place 1 status token on this unit. If the destroyed unit was an ally, remove it from the game.

X = the number of status tokens on this unit

flavor_text: I love fighters with an incubation period.

effect: Draw 3 cards.
flavor_text: And still you try to fathom what I am about

ability:
[main][.][exhaust][.]1[knife]: Deal 1 damage to a target unit on your battlefield. If you do, you may deal 1 damage to a target unit on an opponent's battlefield.

Focus 1: If both targeted units are unexhausted, you may place 1 exhaustion token on both units instead of damage.

inexhaustible_effect:
This unit now has the following ability:

Spiked Skin 2: When this unit is damaged by one or more attacking or countering units, simultaneously deal 2 damage to each unit that is attacking or countering this unit.

effect: Place 2 exhaustion tokens on a target unit.
flavor_text: Quiet your mind. Listen to my words.

ability: Ambush 2: When this unit comes into play, you may inflict 2 damage on a target unit or Phoenixborn.
flavor_text: You'll know they're here when the bolt hits your head.

inexhaustible_effect:
When placing this spell onto your battlefield, choose a unit an opponent has in play. Place status tokens on this spell equal to the chosen unit's attack value. This spell is considered to be an ally that has an attack and life value equal to the number of status tokens on it, and a recover value of 0. Alterations cannot be placed on this spell.

Fleeting: Discard this card at the end of the round.

ability:
[side][.][exhaust]: Add 2 to a target unit's attack value for the remainder of the turn.
Focus 2: Add 1 more to that unit's attack value for the remainder of the turn.
flavor_text: Now give 'em hell!

ability: [main][.][exhaust][.]1[knife]: Place a Blood Puppet conjuration onto a target player's battlefield.
flavor_text: A veritable army flows through my veins.

ability: [main][.][exhaust][.]2[basic]: Place a Blue Jaguar conjuration onto your battlefield.
flavor_text: The valley itself shall rise against the foe!

ability: [main][.][exhaust][.]1[frog]: Place a Butterfly Monk conjuration onto your battlefield.
flavor_text: Heed our ancient pact and aid me now!

ability:
[main][.][exhaust][.]3[knife]: Place a Dread Wraith conjuration onto your battlefield.

Focus 2: You may remove 1 exhaustion token from a Dread Wraith you control.
flavor_text: Your hunger shall not be assuaged, but you will seek it nonetheless.

ability: [main][.][exhaust][.]1[mask][.]1[basic]: Place a False Demon conjuration onto your battlefield.
flavor_text: It is nothing at all, yet it is everything you fear.

ability: [main][.][exhaust][.]1[leaf][.]1[basic]: Place a Frostback Bear conjuration onto your battlefield.
flavor_text: The North incarnate.

ability: [main][.][exhaust][.]1[leaf]: Place a Gilder conjuration onto your battlefield. You may deal 1 damage to a target unit.
flavor_text: The children of the next world rally to me.

ability:
[main][.][exhaust][.]2[leaf][.]1[basic]: Place an Ice Golem conjuration onto your battlefield.

Focus 2: You may remove 1 wound token from all Ice Golems you control.
flavor_text: Once frost takes hold of something, it grows n' grows.

ability:
[main][.][exhaust][.]6[basic]: Place an Iron Rhino conjuration onto your battlefield.

Focus 1: Reduce the activation cost of this spell by 1[basic].

Focus 2: Reduce the activation cost of this spell by an additional 1[basic].

[side][.][exhaust][.]1[mask][.]1[basic]: Place a Masked Wolf conjuration onto your battlefield.

Focus 1: You may change the activation cost of this ability to [side][.][exhaust][.]1[wolf].
flavor_text: When they kill you, you will not see them.

ability: [main][.][exhaust][.]1[mask]: Place a Mist Spirit conjuration onto your battlefield. You may spend an additional 1[basic] when activating this spell to place an additional Mist Spirit conjuration onto your battlefield.
flavor_text: The enemy has come. To me, my little friends!

ability:
[main][.][exhaust][.]2[heart]: Place a Nightshade Swallow conjuration onto your battlefield.

Focus 1: You may choose a target player to discard 1 card off the top of their draw pile if you have fewer dice in your active pool that an opponent.

[main][.][exhaust][.]1[heart]: Place an Orchid Dove conjuration onto your battlefield.

Focus 1: You may change the activation cost of this spell to [main][.][exhaust][.]1[basic].

Focus 2: You may deal 1 damage to a target player's Phoenixborn if they do not have any cards in their draw pile.
[main][.][exhaust][.]3[basic]: Place a Seaside Raven conjuration onto your battlefield.
flavor_text: Swift, beautiful and carnivorous.

ability:
[main][.][exhaust][.]3[mask]: Place a Shadow Hound conjuration onto your battlefield.

Focus 1: You may deal 1 damage to a target unit.

Focus 2: Then you may deal 1 damage to a target unit.
flavor_text: My imaginary play thing is gonna destroy you for reals!

ability: [main][.][exhaust][.]1[wolf]: Place a Shadow Spirit conjuration onto your battlefield.
flavor_text: You probably don't think of shadows as cute, but they are. You know what else are cute? Puppies! Why are we talking about puppies?

ability:
[main][.][exhaust][.]1[snake][.]1[frog]: Place a Silver Snake conjuration onto your battlefield.

Focus 1: Place 1 status token on that Silver Snake.

Focus 2: Place 1 additional status token on that Silver Snake.
inexhaustible_effect: Spell Guard: This spell cannot be affected by an opponent's spell.

effect: You may play this spell when a unit you control is destroyed. Place 2 Sleeping Widow conjurations onto your battlefield.
flavor_text: Even my schemes have schemes.

ability: [main][.][exhaust][.]1[heart]: Place a Three-Eyed Owl conjuration onto your battlefield.
flavor_text: Owls are such lovely little entrail-eaters aren't they?

effect: Play this spell after your Phoenixborn has received damage. Deal 3 damage to a target unit or Phoenixborn.
flavor_text: No, no dear. That's not how it's done. This is!

ability: Memory Drain 1: [main][.][exhaust]: Choose a target player to discard 1 card of their choice from their hand.
flavor_text: My owls respectfully ask you to reconsider.

ability: [side][.][exhaust][.]1[mask]: Choose a target unit to gain the following ability for the remainder of the turn:
inexhaustible_effect: Illusion: If this unit receives damage as a result of a unit's attack or counter, destroy this unit.
flavor_text: You seem so sure about what's real and what isn't.

effect: Move 1 token from a target player's non-Phoenixborn card onto another non-Phoenixborn card that player controls.
flavor_text: Oh, I think we can do better, don't you?

inexhaustible_effect: Respark: 2[basic]
flavor_text: This meat is still yet mine.

effect: You may play this spell when an opponent would use a spell, ability, or dice power that targets you, your draw pile, your discard pile, or your Phoenixborn. Cancel the effects of that spell, ability, or dice power.
flavor_text: Taa-taa, cutie!
